SELECT zo.user_id, zo.save_time, zo.add_time, zo.save_time1, zo.upload_id, zo.equipment_id, tur.remindsNum, tut.userDurtion FROM ( SELECT tuj.user_id, DATE_FORMAT(tuj.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d') save_time, tuj.save_time save_time1, upload_id,equipment_id,add_time FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log tuj GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tuj.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), tuj.user_id ORDER BY substr(tuj.save_time, 1, 10) DESC ) zo LEFT JOIN ( SELECT upload_id, user_id, date_format(reminds_time, '%Y-%m-%d') reminds_time, COUNT(*) remindsNum FROM t_use_reminds GROUP BY substr(reminds_time, 1, 10), user_id ) tur ON zo.user_id = tur.user_id AND zo.save_time = tur.reminds_time LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `id`, date_format(use_time, '%Y-%m-%d') use_time, `save_time`, user_id, upload_id,
COUNT(*) /20 userDurtion FROM t_use_time GROUP BY substr(use_time, 1, 10), user_id ) tut ON zo.user_id = tut.user_id AND zo.save_time = tut.use_time
and zo.upload_id = #{uploadId} and zo.user_id = #{userId}
and zo.save_time >= #{startTime} AND zo.save_time <= #{endTime}
and YEARWEEK(date_format(zo.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
and DATE_FORMAT(zo.save_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
and QUARTER(zo.save_time)=QUARTER(now()) and YEAR(zo.save_time)=YEAR(NOW())
ORDER BY zo.add_time DESC
